    • Method Detail

      • createNewWetland

        public void createNewWetland(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String locationZone,
                             java.lang.String type,
                             java.lang.Double km2,
                             java.lang.String fotoURL,
                             boolean protectedArea)
        Name: createWetland This method is necessary to be able to create a wetland according to a series of requested information. poption. pre: that the person enters values according to what is asked of him/her
        . post: a new wetland is created.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the wetland you are creating. pname != null && pname != "".
        locationZone - location zone in which the person is located, whether urban or rural. plocationZone != null && plocationZone != "".
        type - type of wetland, whether public or private. ptype != null && ptype != "".
        km2 - square kilometers wetland size. pkm2 != null && pkm2 != "".
        fotoURL - URL of the photo provided by the user. pfotoURL != null && pfotoURL != "".
        protectedArea - check whether the area has been declared a protected area or not. pprotectedArea != null && pprotectedArea != "".

      • searchWetland

        public Wetland searchWetland(java.lang.String name)
        Name: searchWetland With this method you can search for a specific wetland and be able to record a species or event in it.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the wetland
        Returns:

      • registerNewSpecieControladora

        public void registerNewSpecieControladora(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String nameSpecie,
                                          java.lang.String scientificName,
                                          boolean migratorySpecies,
                                          int type,
                                          boolean isFlora)
        Name: registerNewSpecieControladora This method will record a new species in a wetland previously given by the user. pre: that the person enters values according to what is asked of him/her
        . post: a new species is recorded.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the wetland to which you want to register a new species.
        nameSpecie - name of the species to be registered.
        scientificName - scientific name of the species to be registered.
        migratorySpecies - necessary condition to know if the species is migratory or not.
        type - the type of species according to all its classifications
        isFlora - this is necessary to know whether the species recorded is flora or fauna.

      • registerNewEventControladora

        public void registerNewEventControladora(java.lang.String name,
                                         int typeEvent,
                                         java.lang.String dateEvent,
                                         java.lang.String nameRecorder,
                                         double cost,
                                         java.lang.String description)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Name: registerNewEventMain This method will record a new event in a wetland previously given by the user. pre: that the person enters values according to what is asked of him/her
        . post: a new event is recorded.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the wetland to which you want to register a new event.
        typeEvent - this is necessary to know the type of event.
        dateEvent - to know the type and date on which the event occurred.
        nameRecorder - to find out who registered the event.
        cost - to know who the cost of the event.
        description - a short description.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Name: amountOfMaintenanceMain This method will reflect the amount of maintenance given according to a year. pre: that the person enters values according to what is asked of him/her
        . post: events held during the year.
        Parameters:
        yearMaintenance - year entered by the user to be able to search for their number of maintenances.
        Returns:
